Custom furniture company

Minimal forms. Precise joinery. Made for your space.

Mobila Studio designs and builds custom furniture for residential and boutique commercial spaces. Every piece is tailored, refined, and delivered with white-glove installation.

Signature pieces

From sculpted kitchen islands to warm wood libraries, we balance clean geometry with tactile surfaces.

Design-forward furniture with a quiet confidence.

We work collaboratively with homeowners, architects, and developers to deliver furniture that feels intentional. Our process blends space planning, material palettes, and smart hardware to create a refined everyday experience.

Premium materials

We source European oak, walnut, and matte laminates that stand up to daily life.

Precision install

Measured, fabricated, and installed by the same studio team for a seamless finish.
